passage_text: noun. The definition of a plaza is a public square, or a shopping area. An example of a plaza is a local mall. 1  a public square or marketplace in a city or town.

Learner's definition of PLAZA. [count]. 1. : an open public area that is usually near city buildings and that often has trees and bushes and places to sit, walk, and shop. They put his statue in the town's plaza.

Full Definition of PLAZA. 1. a: a public square in a city or town b: an open area usually located near urban buildings and often featuring walkways, trees and shrubs, places to sit, and sometimes shops. 2. : a place on a thoroughfare (as a turnpike) at which all traffic must temporarily stop (as to pay tolls).
